format: A data frame with 574 observations on the following 4 variables.

parameters.country: the country, as it appears in the data
parameters.month: the month the crisis started, if known
parameters.type: the type of crisis, entered here as "banking", "currency", "debt", or "debtrestructuring"

title: Systemic Banking Crises Database II
description:
Description
A data set on banking, currency, debt, and debt-restructuring crises from
1970 to 2017.
reference:
Data are cobbled from the second and third sheets of the spreadsheet
the authors provide. Country names are as entered in their spreadsheet.
Liberia has an "NA" in the raw data for sovereign debt restructuring and I
don't know why. I elect to keep it.
